seo.title: About — Aurora Esports ASBL
seo.description: Who we are, our mission and our journey from 2023 to Division 1 in 2025.

about.headerDesc: Aurora Esports was born in 2023 as a competitive esports team and became an official ASBL in 2025 when joining Division 1 of the TransIP Road of Legends League. We exist to develop talent, structure players and staff, and give visibility to esports as a legitimate discipline in Belgium.
